name: ADBfree
tagline: ADB android diagnostic and repair tool
body:
### Welcome to ADBfree.
This program is a collection of ADB related tools to help in diagnosing and repairing Android Phones

### Features
+ Factory Reset
+ Data Transfer
+ Reboot to Download(ODIN) mode
+ Control Phone from PC (ADBcontrol)
+ More coming soon...

### Bugs
Please let me know by phone, WhatsApp or at kyleberries@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
